title: New free champion rotation: Kalista, Draven, Thresh and more!

replies.body: Expect to see all the kat players 1v5 failing
Can't wait to vs a noob thresh x3

How does Kat have the same difficulty as Draaaaaaven I mean it should be;
{{champion:119}} is 10/10 Difficulty and {{champion:55}}  2/10
Expect to hear how truly outrageous gems are for the rest of the week in 85% of your matches.
Very random pot of champions this week... I wonder if Galio will still be a rare pick.

Hey can someone tell someone that can fix this to like have a look into it? I join a game normal everything is going fine but when i spawn level 1 I click to move and it sets my move point  in the pool of the enemy team. I can't change when im going and i just keep heading to it. (I can recall and do other stuff that will let me move my champ somewhere but i cant auto attack so after my teammates yelling at me i left then rejoined and it was fixed. Anyway 3 games later i DC in the loading screen just before the game and im at 100% I click reconnect strait away and go back into the loading screen goes fine then i join the game and right away im kicked for pro longed inactivity <?????????????? and with that comes a 20x5 min way thanks :( 
Please fix I haven't got to wait for leaving or afking for like 200 games and this wasn't my fault i don't even know why i DCed. I will pay the time for it since i still wanna play but the reconnect then kicked thing has happened 3 times to me now and is a also happens to my friends sometimes.
